name: Fruitboat
description:
Help the fruits to come back to their family!

You play as a small boat that helps different fruits to get back to their family! in the process you have to solve puzzles.

Movement:

-  or  to move the boat.

-  to interact.

-  for Menu.

Good luck!

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam #194 with the Theme "Tiny Boat" and is a result of 4 days of work after giving up my first Idea which have cost me about 2 Days. 

I made this game alone with the use of the following assets::

  1. For the blocks i used 2D Pixel Art - Isometric Blocks - Free Sprites from DevilsWork.shop
  2. For the soundtracks i used 3 soundtracks by robert0504 . 

i can really recommend their assets!
